end_color=”#30da55″]

1 $YEVO = 0.125 ETH

—-

We will issue up to 2,222 tokens for the presale, and all the unsold tokens will bе destroyed and additional release оf tokens will not be possible.

[/stm_panel_box][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space][stm_panel_box title=”Uniswap Listing” subtitle=”Sept 11, 2020″ css_animation=”fadeInDown” start_color=”#00e3be” end_color=”#30da55″]

1 $YEVO = 0.15 ETH+

—-

We will provide 1,111 YEVO and 166.5 ETH to the Uniswap liquidity pool and lock it forever.

[/stm_panel_box][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”160″ md_spacing=”150″ sm_spacing=”120″ xs_spacing=”40″][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_row el_id=”how_it_works”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading stripe_pos=”bottom” text=”What is Yearn Evolved?” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:48|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”60″ md_spacing=”50″ sm_spacing=”50″ xs_spacing=”40″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][vc_single_image image=”3960″ img_size=”full” css_animation=”flipInY” css=”.vc_custom_1599513463518{margin-top: 30px !important;}”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6″][stm_spacing sm_spacing=”40″ xs_spacing=”30″][vc_column_text css_animation=”lightSpeedIn” animation_delay=”0.5″]It is a 2-token model that aims to achieve what DeFi was supposed to be.
YEVO will be the governance token and 2nd token will be the fuel token for the farming pools.[/vc_column_text][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”30″ md_spacing=”30″ sm_spacing=”10″ xs_spacing=”10″][vc_column_text css_animation=”lightSpeedIn” animation_delay=”0.5″]Providing utility to the farmed token is our main focus. We do not want the community to farm, dump on the market and move on to next. This will be achieved when 2nd token is in circulation, gaining utility in a working product. Building an AMM and using the token as the LP fees.[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text css_animation=”lightSpeedIn” animation_delay=”1″]

  • An AMM that focus on interoperability and scalability
  • Users can swap different chain tokens and not only ERC-20
  • A community platform for contribution.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”60″ md_spacing=”50″ sm_spacing=”50″ xs_spacing=”40″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1521027204238{background-image: url(http://yevo.finance/media/2018/03/bubbleyevo.png) !important;background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;}”][vc_column][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”140″ md_spacing=”100″ sm_spacing=”70″ xs_spacing=”60″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-5″][vc_custom_heading stripe_pos=”bottom” text=”Our Staking Platform” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:46|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1599496881451{margin-bottom: 45px !important;}”][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”40″ md_spacing=”40″ sm_spacing=”40″ xs_spacing=”40″][vc_column_text css_animation=”left-to-right” animation_delay=”0.5″]Staking will be launched right after the UniSwap Listing on Sept 11![/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation=”left-to-right” animation_delay=”1″]$YEVO will be the governance token and used to farm in initial pool A and pool B.

Pool A will be Balancer and pool B will be Uniswap.

Pool A: BPT tokens (98:2) → DAI: YEVO

Stake BPT tokens to earn YEVO

Pool B: YEVO tokens

Stake YEVO tokens to earn Uni-V2 Fees

[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title=”Join now” style=”custom” custom_background=”#30da55″ custom_text=”#ffffff” shape=”round” css_animation=”left-to-right” link=”url:%23||target:%20_blank|” css=”.vc_custom_1599567033528{margin-right: 20px !important;}” animation_delay=”1″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/12″ offset=”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”100″ md_spacing=”100″ sm_spacing=”50″ xs_spacing=”20″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_id=”tokens_offering”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading stripe_pos=”bottom” text=”Token Structure” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:48|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”60″ md_spacing=”50″ sm_spacing=”50″ xs_spacing=”40″][stm_token_structure tokens=”%5B%7B%22value%22%3A%2286%22%2C%22label%22%3A%22Distributed%20to%20Community%22%2C%22color%22%3A%22%235b45bf%22%7D%2C%7B%22value%22%3A%227%22%2C%22label%22%3A%22Locked%22%2C%22color%22%3A%22%231c7bf7%22%7D%2C%7B%22value%22%3A%227%22%2C%22label%22%3A%22Dev%2FMarketing%22%2C%22color%22%3A%22%231ebade%22%7D%5D”][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”50″ md_spacing=”40″ sm_spacing=”30″ xs_spacing=”20″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner offset=”vc_col-lg-8 vc_col-md-8″][vc_column_text css_animation=”left-to-right” animation_delay=”1″]

Cost of 1 token YEVO (Presale): 0.125 ETH
Term of presale sale: 2 days with the possibility of an automatic early completion in pursuing the final goals of Presale
Expanded goals after the start of Presale: Impossible
Technical limitation of tokens: 7,777
Adjustable emission: All unsold and unallocated tokens will bе destroyed and additional release оf tokens will not be possible
Secured ways to purchase tokens: Ethereum (ETH)
Hardcap: 280 ETH

[/vc_column_text][stm_spacing sm_spacing=”40″ xs_spacing=”40″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner css=”.vc_custom_1521797456545{background-image: url(http://yevo.finance/media/2018/03/iceberg.jpg) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4″][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”40″ md_spacing=”40″ sm_spacing=”40″ xs_spacing=”40″][vc_column_text]
